_header: O blessed Lord of heaven celestial
Subjects: carols, political; political poems; Arthur, prince of Wales
_description: A political carol honoring Prince Arthur — three 10-line stanzas (ababccccdd) with 4-line burden: ‘From stormy wyndis & grevous wethir / Good lord preserue the estrige fether’

BLAdd5465.First Lines:
O blessed lord of heuyn celestiallWhich formyd hast of þi most
                    speciall grace…
BLAdd5465.Last Lines: …His savegard to beWherefore now syng we
